description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Land of Sunshine. Southern California; an authentic record of its natural features, resources and prospects ... Compiled for the Southern California World's Fair Association, etc. [Illustrated.]" Author: BROOK, Harry Ellington. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10412.d.33." Page: 147 Place of Publishing: Los Angeles Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: World's Fair Association & Bureau of Information Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000486104 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
